The MDA framework is a paper by Robin

It's one of my favorite frameworks to

It describes a framework where you as a
designer create mechanics. You create
the rules of your game and those result
in dynamics and how those rules interact
with each other.
So mechanics, bunch of them together
create a dynamic. Then you create a
